amendment.description: Amendment provides that no special message submitted by the President may change any prohibition or limitation of discretionary budget authority set forth in any appropriation Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 18 as printed in the Congressional Record) to include provisions for a new limitation on the use of the line-item veto which states that no special message submitted by the President may change any prohibition or limitation of discretionary budget authority set forth in any appropriation Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pelosi amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
